title: Bias and Fairness in Large Language Models: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the topic of bias and fairness in large language models, highlighting the importance of addressing these issues in AI systems. Discuss the scope of the paper and its objectives. Include a subsection 'Structure of the Survey' to outline the organization of the paper.
